headline: 3 Top Stocks I Wouldn't Hesitate to Invest $1,000 in Right Now
summary: Brookfield Infrastructure offers an attractive combination of income, growth, and value.  Prologis has an excellent record of delivering above-average growth.  Topping that list are Alphabet (NASDAQ: GOOG)(NASDAQ: GOOGL), Brookfield Infrastructure (NYSE: BIP)(NYSE: BIPC), and Prologis (NYSE: PLD).
